body: The utility contract seamlessly integrates with the ERC20 contract, providing a 50% chance to double the input amount. A house edge will be applied to all flips.
A dedicated bot was built to track the bet results and the users statistics. All bets will be posted in our main Telegram by our bot.
The staking contract will receive lost tokens, guaranteeing the stability of the utility contract balance. Buybacks will be strategically executed as needed to uphold the payout token pool.
